channel.title: Uh help please. (New to Java sorry. ^^;)
channel.description:
Starting CheezScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 00 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:313) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:28)
Quite obviously, I'm using Cheez's source. Other than that, I'm stomped. I've tried searching for the "input string:"100" but considering I don't know what that means yet, I have no clue as to how to fix it. If it helps any the last thing I edited was the items.cfg so I could change some stats. Any help/critisicm would be greatly appreciated.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Uh help please. (New to Java sorry. ^^;)
item.dc:creator: @hanku hanku
item.description:
@hanku wrote:

Ah ok.
I edited practicaly all the d-items. [weaps/armour I mean.]
[If your wondering why, It’s becuase I would like to see Dragon being the top armour again.]
So I guess I should go back and restore everything I changed…
Ok.

Thanks for the help guys, if I have more problems I’ll post here.

Read full topic

item.title: Uh help please. (New to Java sorry. ^^;)
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Did you add an item to your list incorrectly? or maybe added a wronge number of stats? you can only use so many then you’d get errors

If you fix/undo the last thing you did, and it still didn’t work, just go into your .rar file, and put a new item.cfg into your source, compile+run…
I know it may such starting over, But you have to sometimes…

Read full topic

Seeing as how half of what it’s displaying as the error is either in the Items.cfg,
or being pulled from the “loadItemlist” in the server part.
